column4: i'm sure this isn't kosher, but i'd be willing to paypal someone 10$CDN if they can fix my problem.. https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+question/48507
you could start by moving your input to the proper place, a bug report, not a question...
i'm not sure it's a bug
if your /dev/* does not contain the partitions listed on fdisk, it's a bug
